scripts.start: npm run lint && NODE_ENV=development node sandbox/output/script
scripts.simpleGit_dev: npm run lint && nodemon -w output simpleGit/output/index
scripts.sandbox_dev: npm run lint && nodemon -w output sandbox/output/script
scripts.server_dev: npm run lint && nodemon -w output backend/output/server
scripts.backend_dev: concurrently -k -n COMPILER,NODEMON -c gray,blue "npm run compile_typescript" "npm run server_dev"
scripts.frontend_dev: concurrently -k -n COMPILER_1,COMPILER_2 -c gray,blue "npm run compile_typescript" "npm run compile_gas"
scripts.style_simple: concurrently -k -n LINT,FORMAY -c grey,blue "npm run lint" "npm run format"
scripts.style_advanced: concurrently -k -n TS-LINT,FORMAT -c grey,blue "npm run ts-lint" "npm run format"
